Would you be interested in doing a 3-4 day training in KC on JavaScript, SPAs, Durandal and the transition to the next version on Angular? We try to do a training session for all of our developers on site at least once a year and would like to focus on those things for the next one.

We use JavaScript all the time for a number of single page apps, so we’re not looking for an intro level training.

it’s 20-30 developers, on site in our office in KC. We can have a number of senior developers, well versed in JS and SPAs to help proctor, since that’s a large class.

We have had Shawn Wildermuth and Udi Dahan in past years.
